name: Dungeons & Darkness
description: Explore various dungeons, making use of various weapons and magic! Challenge the most deadly locations, make your name as an adventurer! Clear the corridors of monsters, collecting tools and weapons as you go. Watch out for booby traps!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8(8.1) / 7(SP1) / Vista(SP2) / 10 (64bit) Processor: Core2Duo2.0GHz or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce9600GT Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Very early game and overall I like the style; still needs ALOT of work.  A map would help alot because ( as far as I can tell) you keep going through the same level over and over ( which changes later I'm sure ) and finding the 'new' area is a pain in the ♥♥♥. I assume the 'new' area is a doorway with blue torches? very confusing...  If you find this game cheap I suggest buying and following it's development.
